definitions.definition: a person who habitually causes difficulty or problems, especially by inciting others to defy those in authority.
examples: rabble-rouser, rogue, scourge, agitator, agent provocateur, ringleader; Moreincendiary, firebrand, demagogue; scandalmonger, gossipmonger, meddler, nuisance, mischief-maker, hell raiser; informalbadass "I have little use for my former friends, who were, for the most part, troublemakers"Moreincendiary, firebrand, demagogue; scandalmonger, gossipmonger, meddler, nuisance, mischief-maker, hell raiser; badass I have little use for my former friends, who were, for the most part, troublemakers
